formulas.title: Formula (extracted text)
formulas.raw: \[ \textbf{Gain} = P_{\text{sale}} - \big( B_{\text{cost}} + C_{\text{sell}} \big) \] \[ \textbf{Net Gain Before Reliefs} = \max(0,\ \text{Gain} - E_{\text{exclusions}} ) \] \[ \textbf{Taxable Gain} = \max\big(0,\ \text{Net Gain Before Reliefs} - A_{\text{allowance}} - L_{\text{losses}}\big) \] \[ \textbf{Jurisdiction Adjustments} = \begin{cases} \text{US: } \text{ST} \to t_{\text{ST}},\ \text{LT} \to t_{\text{LT}} \\ \text{UK: } t_{\text{asset,band}} \\ \text{AU: } \text{if LT} \Rightarrow 50\% \text{ discount} \\ \text{IE: } 33\% \ (\text{typical}) \\ \text{ZA: } \text{include } 40\% \text{ of gain then apply marginal rate} \end{cases} \] \[ \textbf{Tax} = \text{Taxable Gain}_{\text{(after adjustments)}} \times t \quad ; \quad \textbf{After-Tax Proceeds} = P_{\text{sale}} - \text{Tax} \]
